Text:
Seriously... Why? Bloody why use .cbr for fsck sake? Even if on a Mac.. what's wrong with rar, tar[gz,bz], zip ...

For those who want an easy way of reading it on your device (iphone, ipad, blackberry, etc..), on Mac, select all images and open them in Preview. then Edit > Select All, and File > Print selected images, then save as PDF. 

Thanks for the upload. Reminded me of what I missed.. going for a year subscription :)
